sentences.sContent: And over the years, modders have introduced several innovations that have grown into entire product categories—like mountain bikes, heart-lung machines, and rodeo kayaks.
sentences.sContent_eng: And over the years, modders have introduced several innovations that have grown into entire product categories—like mountain bikes, heart-lung machines, and rodeo kayaks.
sentences.sCn: 这些年来，游戏制作者们已经引进了一些进入整个生产线的创新产品——想山地车、心肺呼吸器、竞技皮划艇.

sentences.sContent: The spurs cause blunt trauma to the shoulders which again never have time to heal properly before the horse is ridden and spurred in another rodeo.
sentences.sContent_eng: The spurs cause blunt trauma to the shoulders which again never have time to heal properly before the horse is ridden and spurred in another rodeo.
sentences.sCn: 马刺会造成肩膀的钝伤，这些伤从来都没有等到痊愈就会被在另一场竞技秀中再次被骑和刺。

trans.tranOther: a type of entertainment in which  cowboy s  ride wild horses, catch cattle with ropes, and ride in races
